queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:tz_documents` ( `doc_id` int unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `company_id` int unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `doc_category_id` int NULL, `type` char(1) NOT NULL default 'I', `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', `create_date` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`doc_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3;

CREATE TABLE `?:tz_documents_description` ( `doc_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL default '', `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `text` text NULL, UNIQUE KEY (`doc_id`,`lang_code`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3;

CREATE TABLE `?:tz_files_docs` ( `file_id` int unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `doc_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL default '', `file_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `path_file` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`file_id`), UNIQUE KEY `file_id` (`file_id`,`doc_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3;
